citation: Residential Tenancy (End of Emergency Period for COVID-19 Emergency) Order 2021 (Tas)
text:
Residential Tenancy (End of Emergency Period for COVID-19 Emergency) Order 2021

I make the following order under section 3A(4) of the Residential Tenancy Act 1997 .

20 January 2021

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Building and Construction

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Residential Tenancy (End of Emergency Period for COVID-19 Emergency) Order 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 31 January 2021.

3. End of emergency period for COVID-19 emergency
    For the purposes of section 3A(4) of the Residential Tenancy Act 1997 , it is declared that the emergency period has ended.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 January 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
